title: Why do megadoses of Vitamins B6/B12 make dreams more intense?
description: Answer (1 of 6): First of all, to say that B vitamins don't cause more intense dreams because they're in foods and or drinks is just pure faulty logic. That doesn't even make sense lol.  (TL;DR at the bottom, but that's boring.) I wish I had a more exact and scientific answer for you, but here...
